title: NWEA Map configuration
description: Use this form to configure your NWEA Map assessment data for loading into Ed-Fi.

INPUT_FILE.title: Assessment File
INPUT_FILE.description: The assessment file to be loaded

STUDENT_ID_NAME.title: Ed-Fi studentUniqueId column
STUDENT_ID_NAME.description: Which column to use as the Ed-Fi studentUniqueId. Can be one of the native columns in the assessment file or a value mapped from a crosswalk (must be supplied)

STUDENT_ID_XWALK.title: Student ID crosswalk
STUDENT_ID_XWALK.description: A two-column CSV mapping from and ID included in the assessment file and to the studentUniqueId value in Ed-Fi

STUDENT_ID_JOIN_COLUMN.title: Student ID join column for crosswalk
STUDENT_ID_JOIN_COLUMN.description: Declare which column in the assessment file should be used for the crosswalk join
